title: Tech Blog
body: Created a Tech Blog website that users can interface with that makes it easy for the user to view and interact with information stored in a blog website. I was challenged with architecting and building a website where developers can publish their blog posts and comment on other developersâ€™ posts as well. I employeed the MVC paradigm in the architectural structure, while utilizing handlebars as the HTML templating language, with Sequelize as the ORM and the express-session npm package for authentication.
